item.description:
The second Thursday of every month New Bedford has an evening of entertainment sponsored by AHA! (art, history, and architecture). The group has gone many times and it's always fun. The theme for this evening, April 14, is Sustainable Earth. When you look on the calendar (link below) you will see lectures, gallery shows, and live music.

Here is the AHA! website: http://www.ahanewbedf...

In addition to the many sustainability events, many of the art students' work from UMD will be displayed, including the master's in fine arts show, which is always excellent! After we check out a bunch of events, we'll grab some dinner.

You can park for free on the street around 6, or if you decide to come much earlier just bring a couple quarters for the meters. I will e-mail my cell number to Yes responders on the day of the event.

Come out for a night of free entertainment! Hope to see you there. This is a joint event with Southcoast Women's Meetup. Please RSVP on just one site.
item.how_to_find_us: look for me in the lobby -- tall, shoulder-length hair, thick glasses

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: AHA! night in New Bedford
